Eero Kuusisto to adam
show details 4:28 AM (3 minutes ago)
cleardot
Reply

cleardot


Hi Adam!

Do you happen to have the Cooliris formerly known as PicLens plugin installed? It is known to crash Safari especially on flash based sites. I had the same problem and it messed few of my live shows too but since I removed it things have been working just fine.

Thanks for the show, I hope this tip helps.

//Eero
Passengers report scare on earlier US Airways Flight 1549 - CNN.com
Help Ireland or it will exit euro, economist warns - Telegraph
UK MPs hiding expenses!
Chris Walker to adam
show details 5:26 PM (2 hours ago)
cleardot
Reply

cleardot


They've snook in some plans to keep their expenses secret, they did it when we were all busy with the Heathrow issue, this needs some exposure, they are voting on Thursday!
TheyWorkforYou.co.uk has some brilliant info on it, and how to contact your MPs.

Here's Various Links:
www.theyworkforyou.com[~]foiorder2009
www.mysociety.org[~]6-days-to-stop-mps-concealing-their-expenses
www.boingboing.net[~]brits-act-now-to-sto.html
www.guardian.co.uk[~]mps-expenses-exemption
www.dailymail.co.uk[~]Taxpayers-foot-1m-publication-expenses-MPs-STILL-want-cover-up.html

Thanks!
Chris.
